position.title: Wealth Risk Manager
position.companyName: Wealth Risk Management & LDX Global, Inc.
position.description:
Wealth Risk Management is a member firm of LDX Global, Inc. LDX helps individuals and business owners protect their wealth from the financial risks of dying too soon, living to long or becoming disabled and/or chronically ill. Our team collaborates with financial advisors and insurance professionals to provide thoughtful strategies and assistance in the areas of business & estate planning and life insurance. The goal is to maximize the wealth they leave to their loved ones and minimize financial losses due to taxes and poor planning. Our recommendations are driven by the needs and circumstances of the client, not by any specific product or company affiliation.

Both firms are affiliated with Insurance Designers of America (IDA) is one of the largest and oldest networks of brokerage general agencies throughout the US. It's 53 member firms are dedicated to serving the needs of professional insurance producers, financial planners & advisors. IDA's mission is to provide these professionals with the broad selection insurance of products their clients need and excellent underwriting and case management to deliver them.

linkedInData.summary:
For nearly 35 years, I have been involved in the pension and retirement industry. As a Certified Pension Consultant and an Accredited Investment Fiduciary, it is my responsibility to protect plan sponsors. As a Chartered Financial Consultant, I educate plan participants on their investment options and help them find the asset allocation that is right for them. I began Pension Planning $olutions, Inc. in 1999. In 2005 the firm became a U.S. Securities & Exchange Registered Investment Adviser with the mission of founding a fee-only, independent, unbiased, conflict-free retirement plan and investment consulting firm with an emphasis on providing fiduciary guidance. I continue this mission today and uphold a tradition of excellence in my work.

Specialties: Investment fiduciary, corporate retirements plans, 401(k)s, investment management, cash balance plans
linkedInData.headline: Certified Pension Consultant|Chartered Financial Consultant®|Accredited Investment Fiduciary®|Cash Balance Consultant

position.title: Financial Adviser
position.description:
Pension Planning $olutions, Inc. is a retirement plan and investment consulting firm with an emphasis on providing fiduciary guidance to Retirement Committees and Boards of Directors. As acting fiduciary, we are obligated to protect plan sponsors in the event of a random Department of Labor (DOL) audit or a participant complaint. We review current service provider agreements, plan documents and contracts; evaluate breadth of investments and their related expenses; formalize and implement an Investment Policy Statement (IPS); monitor the plan’s investments monthly, and provide quarterly investment fiduciary reports to the Retirement Plan Committee.

As financial advisers, we prepare plan participants for retirement. We educate participants about the dangers of chasing performance and the danger of trying to time the market. Our financial advisers give participants the knowledge and tools to make informed investment decisions.

Pension Planning $olutions, Inc. does not have any affiliation with any broker dealer firm, bank, trust or insurance company. Our financial advisers are not compensated by any investments that we recommend. We operate on a fee-only basis and provide full fee disclosure. As financial advisers and acting fiduciaries, we are unbiased relative to investments and provide conflict-free investment advice. Pension Planning $olutions, Inc. is completely independent, acting in the best interest of our clients.

linkedInData.summary:
Our team, Moceri Wealth Management Group, oversees and coordinates the financial affairs for a select group of families, retirees, corporate executives, business owners, and non-profit organizations in the Metro Detroit area and around the country. We believe in providing holistic education for clients to help them make better decisions about their financial affairs.
Our goal is to simplify and bring clarity to clients’ financial lives. We coordinate our efforts with highly regarded outside advisors including attorneys, tax professionals, and insurance experts that are pre-screened by our team.
We add value with our total team approach, where we meet with clients on a regular basis throughout the year, and include an annual in-depth financial review to update their retirement plan, review goals, and make changes as needed. We are committed to providing the highest level of customer service to all clients.

position.title: Vice President/Investments, Portfolio Manager - Solutions Program - Stifel
position.description:
After a 35-year career at Merrill Lynch, I joined Stifel in 2020 as 
Vice President/Investments and Portfolio Manager - Solutions Program.  I hold a Bachelor of Science degree from Michigan State University and an MBA from U of D-Mercy. The Rochester, Michigan, area has been our home for over 35 years and is where my wife and I are actively involved in the community. I have served as a past member of the N. Oakland YMCA Board, and the Rochester Rotary. 
You should connect with us if:
1- You are currently retired or are near retirement and are seeking a holistic retirement plan.
2- You have recently changed employment.
3- Are in the process of or are considering divorce and are looking for a new, professional relationship with a financial advisor.
4- Are dissatisfied with your current financial advisor and would like a second opinion.
5- Are a non-profit organization considering a Request for Proposal for your current investment portfolio.
6- Are a business owner or executive looking for holistic, professional financial guidance.

linkedInData.summary:
•	Helping people grow their business while building exceptional lives. 

♦ I’m from a close family, early on I learned to figure things out on my own, to be confident and appreciate the value of hard work and strong community. We were taught to dream big and figure out how to build a successful life – to make things better for ourselves and those we love. 

I believe success starts by surrounding myself with the right people – loyal friends, trustworthy associates and ethical partners – where mutual support and encouragement help us reach for every articulated goal.

♦♦ Most of my career has consisted of recruiting, developing people and growing business. I truly enjoy finding people with the potential to be the best and convincing them to join the team. Once on board, I’m particularly good at coaching and mentoring these high potentials to perform at levels they never thought possible. I like to think if I can help them connect their purpose to the organization’s goals and understand the common ground between customer and client they will exceed any goal they make for themselves. Once you understand what you want, the path to success is more than just money, its transformational. 

In professional financial investment management terms, I help grow business:
•	For advisors looking to develop new clients or expand their product mix into wealth management practice
•	For branch managers to help recruit experienced Financial Advisors, hire and train junior Financial Advisors as well as hiring and training support staff.
•	For regional managers helping to hire, train and develop branch managers while coaching their leadership skills. Driving all aspects of transforming the sales force toward a wealth management business model. 
•	For financial firm leaders with product, service and risk areas and developing a unified message.

Securities Licenses: 3, 5, 7, 8, 15, 63 & 65 
California Insurance License: #0A04427

position.title: Managing Director-Complex Branch Manager
position.location: South County including Newport Beach, Irvine and Laguna Beach
position.description:
Industry experience includes extensive Investment & Wealth Management / Recruiting experience in a variety of institutions throughout California, including executive roles in Branch/Complex and Regional management along with 10 years of early career experience as a Financial Advisor. Exceptional communicator with the ability to break down the complex into simple, easy to understand concepts. Earns client and team member trust quickly and regularly sought after to lead the way. A calculated risk taker who trusts both facts and intuition. 

Securities Licenses: 3, 5, 7, 8, 15, 63 & 65 
California Insurance License: #0A04427

At Wells Fargo, led the firm from investment only initiatives to build a wealth management practice focused on solid and sound investment advisement as well as liability and risk management strategies. 
●	Exceeded all performance goals over the eight-year period and grew revenues from $34M in 2008 to $104M in 2016.
●	Built “Lending” into the Complex to finish in the top three in the brokerage division.
●	Grew the Financial Advisor staff from 77 in 2008 to 106 in 2016. Recruited 55 Financial Advisors from competitor companies and trained, managed and mentored new branch managers for the LA/OC markets. 
●	In the last two years, audits passed with a strong rating.
●	Led High Net Worth Partnership referrals to the Private Bank and created a culture of cooperation between the brokerage and private bank divisions.
●	Worked with the estate planners, expanded the firm’s insurance business revenues
●	Worked with Trust company to meet client needs
●	Earned “Premier Manager” status six out of the eight years with Wells.
●	Earned “Market/Complex Manager of the Year” awards for 2011 and 2013.

A true business developer who achieves accelerated growth recruiting, building and developing high-performing teams and training advisors in highly successful wealth management strategies.

linkedInData.summary:
I am the Managing Principal and founder of Oak Tree Financial Services, a wealth management firm founded in 2009. I have been involved in the financial services industry since 1981. I hold the designations of CERTIFIED FINANCIAL PLANNER™ professional, Chartered Retirement Planning Counselor from the College of Financial Planning and a Certified Senior Advisor.

For over 40 years, my goal has been to take all the pieces of my client’s financial puzzle and put them in place. To do so, I utilize a proprietary process that integrates wealth management with risk and debt management, income and tax planning, and philanthropy for successful families, professionals, and business owners. The Grow FORMula is designed to continually adjust and monitor their critical life and financial events to keep their plan on track. 

For More information on Ron Moody and Oak Tree Financial Services, please visit https://www.oaktreefinancialservices.com.

linkedInData.summary:
The team at Kaup’s Financial Advisors focuses on helping our clients simplify their financial life by putting all the pieces together.  We are dedicated to developing a trusted relationship with you to create and implement a strategic plan that works to avoid critical gaps, tax inefficiencies, overexposure to risk and unintended consequences.  Our “bucket” approach takes into consideration your investment time horizon, volatility tolerance, income needs and tax qualifications, so we can structure your money for your now, soon, and later years.  We coordinate your investments, insurance, tax, legal, Social Security, and Medicare all into one congruent plan.  

We have been working with individuals and businesses in Nebraska and surrounding states for more than 30 years.

Registered Representative offering securities and advisory services through Cetera Advisor Networks LLC, member FINRA/SIPC, a broker/dealer and Registered Investment Adviser.  Cetera is under separate ownership from any other named entity.
linkedInData.headline: CERTIFIED FINANCIAL PLANNER™ and Advanced Planning Specialist at Kaup's Financial Advisors, Inc.

position.title: Founder, CFP®, CERTIFIED FINANCIAL PLANNER™
position.description:
Founded my firm, Kaup’s Financial Advisors, Inc., 39 years ago in Stuart, and currently have 13 employees specializing in agricultural tax and estate planning strategies, investments and all lines of insurance. We provide tax planning as well as tax preparation, and have prepared more than 1000 tax returns.

Kaup’s publishes new tax tips every week on their website at https://www.kaups.com/ or you can sign up to get them by email. You can schedule Scott Kaup to speak about the new tax law at your next group event by contacting Annie Schurman at 402-924-3607.

linkedInData.summary:
Bob Frater is a CERTIFIED FINANCIAL PLANNER™ practitioner who has provided total financial planning service for his clients since 1980. Bob Frater is founder of the Houston Society of the Institute of Certified Financial Planners (the precursor of the Financial Planning Association) and has served on the Board of Directors at state and national levels. As a recognized leader in the financial planning community, he was awarded the "1997 Houston CFP® of the Year1" by the Institute of Certified Financial Planners. Bob is also the CEO of Houston Asset Management, Inc. Bob's responsibilities include developing and implementing high-level strategies, making major corporate decisions, managing the overall operations and resources of a company.

He is a Registered Principal with SagePoint Financial, Inc., a registered broker/dealer firm member of FINRA and SIPC. He is also an Investment Advisor Representative for Houston Asset Management, Inc., a Registered Investment Advisor not affiliated with SagePoint Financial, Inc.

His clientele include many closely held corporations, executives, and professionals across the U.S. Bob graduated with honors from the University of Wisconsin, Stout with a B.S. in Business in 1976 and received his CFP® certification in 1984. Mr. Frater has been a resident of the Houston Heights since 1978, but spends a lot of time with family in Wisconsin.

Bob and his wife Kelly have two sons, Gordon and Ted. Bob has been very active and has held leadership positions in community and professional organizations. When not fulfilling the needs of clients, Bob is a skier, musician, canoeist, woodworker, and Rotarian.

1The Houston CFP® of the Year Award is not based upon performance or returns experienced by any client or opinions of the advisor's clients or former clients. It does not guarantee future investment success and does not ensure that a client or prospective client will experience a higher level of performance or results.

position.title: Owner / CEO
position.description:
Bob provides comprehensive financial planning services and investment management programs to individuals, businesses, pensions and profit sharing plans, trusts and estates, and charitable organizations.  Whether you are in the process of building your wealth, nearing retirement, living in retirement, or preparing wealth transfers, Bob can customize his services to incorporate your personal goals and financial objectives.
 ______________________________

A firm of experienced professional Financial Planners and highly skilled support personnel providing quality ideas, services, implementation, and investments. We are committed to a timely support of the needs of our clients, profession, and community.

*Registered Representative offering securities through SagePoint Financial, Inc., member FINRA/SIPC.  Investment advisory services offered through Houston Asset Management, Inc., a registered investment advisor not affiliated with SagePoint Financial, Inc. Fixed and/or Traditional Insurance Services offered through Investment Marketing Resources, LP, a company not affiliated with SagePoint Financial or registered as a broker-dealer or investment advisor.
